evidence.text:
ATTILA: We have an important customer inside; furnished him a two-story office space downtown on the cheap last year. He's interested in us doing some built-in work at a residence.
ATTILA: Harry would like some shelving units installed over at his family's property in Doylestown.
HARRY LEE: I hoped someone might follow me out there to take a look at my father's study. My sister and I'd like to surprise him by turning it into a proper library.
ATTILA: We can make you something like that. Let me have Audrey come down to keep an eye on the place. I'll pull the van around.

ATTILA: What's your budget?
HARRY LEE: What's your estimate?

ATTILA: Don't worry, we'll come in on- budget. You want this all done by next Friday, you said?
HARRY LEE: Thursday night, preferably. I can't be here during the week but the staff can let you in, and if anything comes up, have them ring me at the office.
